column1: Little Goat Diner////It is unlike a diner in the sense that the food is intensely flavorful and really really good
column2: from start to finish.  The coffee is dark and strong
column4: the fried pickles are briny and crunchy
column5: the cinnamon bun isn't too sweet
column6: the salad is packed with both vegetables and more decadent treats
column7: and putting kimchi in a reuben sandwich was an inspired idea.  (Yes
column8: we did get all six at once.  It was one of those days.)
